entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
